snippet: I declared my intention to plenty of things as a parent this year, from not letting my children eat in my car to being more present in every moment of their lives. I think it's fair to hold me accountable - so here's how I did.
abstract: I declared my intention to plenty of things as a parent this year, from not letting my children eat in my car to being more present in every moment of their lives. I think it's fair to hold me accountable - so here's how I did.

headline.print_headline: Time for Resolutions and Eye Rolling
